<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_cs_message_email_notification</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Send Email Notification to Unauthenticat</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sys_user"); if(!gr1.get(current.user)){ var email = current.interaction.consumer.email; if(email) gs.eventQueue("sn_customerservice.email_chat",current,email,""); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-05 15:02:34</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>198dcb42eb7021106564ab7e1a5228e4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Send Email for Async Chat</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service" source="sn_customerservice">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_198dcb42eb7021106564ab7e1a5228e4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-04 22:19:47</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=198dcb42eb7021106564ab7e1a5228e4"/> </record_update>
